channel.title: [Project Xion] 317 Blank Source
channel.description:
I am Xion from the new Server under Construction called " Xion Scape". If you need to contact me, my email is:
[CODE] MSN: Xion317@live.com Yahoo: Xion317@yahoo.com GMail: Xion317@gmail.com [/CODE]
Ok well, I have been playing RSPS for about 2 years and there all starting to bore me, so I decided to create my own.
For some time now I have been wanting to create the perfect 317 Server that was based on what the User is requesting unlike some servers such as SilabGarza where most of the staff has quit and the server is going to hell, or 2Speced where you never see an In Game Mod or Admin.
I have decided to code a server from a Blank Source such as WinterLove, unlike most servers where they just use a base such as DavidScape or z508.
I have been coding servers for the past 3 months, but I am still not sure on how to Add or Create Models, or how to Host the Server . . . That is why I have created this thread although.
Ok, enough about me and my past experiences though.
I am currently looking for a mature Dedicated Staff that will help the server until the end . . . Everyone in the team will get a staff spot on the server
- General Team Manager
This person will be the Owner for me when I am offline such as when I am Off on Vacation.
- Open
Server Programmer
This person will Code the Source and Client, will need to get work done by a certain date.
-Xion
-Open
-Open
Sever Promoter/Advetisment
This person will go onto other RSPS communities such as MoparScape, and other servers to adverise the server..
-Open
-Open
-Open
-Open
-Open
Website Coder/Developer
This person will code the Website we will be hosting after we get 20+ Players.
-Open
Website Manager
Will be in charge of all the contents of the website. This person needs to be able to work closely with me and also with the other website team.
-Open
Website Administrator
Will be in charge of Deleteing Spam Posts, and more.
-Open
-Open
Application
[CODE]
-Name:
-Mopar User:
-Age:
-MSN, Yahoo, GMail, Other?:
-Team Possition:
-Proof of experience:
-A little information about you:
-Why should you be on Project Xion?:
[/CODE]
Ok, well i think that will be all.
I will read your applications as soon as i can.
Thank you.
~ Project Xion :D
